reviews.review_msg: Hate this class, drop out before it is too late.

The most disorganized class you will ever take. There are no due dates or instructions for the assignments and the TAs and prof has different criteria for everything. The word limits for assignments are very short and it is impossible to write stuff that is good, his feedback on assignments is bad and vague. Useless class, skip the profandtakesumme

Vague explanation of assignments + a lack of set due dates  an abosolute mess of a course. I know this was an online course and everything is somewhat disorganized, this course was an absolute mess. Seriously.

The most confusing professor, I've had since school went online. His lectures are very long and boring. His assignments are confusing because he doesn't actually give you any guidelines but the worst part is that the word limits on his assignments are way too little. 300 words to finish a whole assignment. 40 pages of reading each week.

A total waste of a class that should be much more interesting, just one hour of class a week where he reads off slides. Rest of the class is dedicated to an unguided conversation that usually goes off topic. 4 major assignments all due at end of semester with vague outlines. Little indication of how well or poorly you are doing by the end of term.
The most disorganized professor ever! He barely explains anything regarding the assignments. Avoid him at all costs.
